name: SoundBetter, Inc.
description: Developer of an online music production marketplace designed to offer platform for recording studios, mixing and mastering engineers and producers and session musicians. The company's online music production marketplace helps to find and securely hire the right pro based on specialty, budget, genre, credits, reviews and sound samples, enabling musicians worldwide to connect and hire top music pros so they can get to great-sounding release-ready songs.
one_liner: Developer of an online music production marketplace designed to offer platform for recording studios, mixing and mastering engineers and producers and session musicians.
